subject: Re: [junit] Re: Testing async calls
msgSnippet: ... No. ... Anything you re going to change. cjs -- Curt Sampson     +81 90 7737 2974   http://www.NetBSD.org Don t you know, in this new Dark
messageBody:
On Wed, 28 Jul 2004, Kalyan Kumar M wrote:

> On a general note: Do you think it's worth writing JUnit test cases
> for all the classes present in legacy code.

No.

> If not, what areas do we need to
> concentrate to write test cases for?

Anything you're going to change.

cjs
